rows.label: bf11590150_0010
rows.name: "Resistance army," my foot.

rows.label: bf11590150_0020
rows.name:
You let Metsu invade,
and then you let him steal the seal.

rows.label: bf11590150_0030
rows.name: I have nothing to say.

rows.label: bf11590150_0040
rows.name: Adel...

rows.label: bf11590150_0050
rows.name: Hmph.

rows.label: bf11590150_0060
rows.name: Your Majesty, this is a grave failure.

rows.label: bf11590150_0070
rows.name:
We must punish Adel and the resistance
in a way that will satisfy the people.

rows.label: bf11590150_0080
rows.name: Your Majesty!

rows.label: bf11590150_0090
rows.name: Perhaps you're right...

rows.label: bf11590150_0100
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: bf11590150_0110
rows.name: Wait a minute.

rows.label: bf11590150_0120
rows.name: Adel was trying to protect the capital...

rows.label: bf11590150_0130
rows.name: Silence! Do not interrupt His Majesty.

rows.label: bf11590150_0140
rows.name: What about you, Zettar?

rows.label: bf11590150_0150
rows.name: What was that?

rows.label: bf11590150_0160
rows.name: I asked, what about you?

rows.label: bf11590150_0170
rows.name: W-what do you mean...?

rows.label: bf11590150_0180
rows.name:
If you're going to punish Adel
for commanding the resistance,

rows.label: bf11590150_0190
rows.name:
then the same goes for you,
who commands the Iiran army.

rows.label: bf11590150_0200
rows.name: Wh-what are you talking about, Your Majesty?

rows.label: bf11590150_0210
rows.name:
Adel was on the front lines.
He's the one who let Metsu get away.

rows.label: bf11590150_0220
rows.name: You think our army wouldn't have let him get away?

rows.label: bf11590150_0230
rows.name: So where was our army then?

rows.label: bf11590150_0240
rows.name:
O-our army...
was prioritizing the protection of our citizens' lives.

rows.label: bf11590150_0250
rows.name: They were helping with the evacuation in the city.

rows.label: bf11590150_0260
rows.name:
While the resistance rushed
to help us in our time of crisis,

rows.label: bf11590150_0270
rows.name:
and while the Superbian army under Emperor Hugo
were risking their lives in battle?

rows.label: bf11590150_0280
rows.name: W-well...

rows.label: bf11590150_0290
rows.name: In a situation like this,

rows.label: bf11590150_0300
rows.name: shouldn't our army have been the first to fight Metsu?

rows.label: bf11590150_0310
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11590150_0320
rows.name: I'm not blaming you, Zettar.

rows.label: bf11590150_0330
rows.name:
You saw it too, didn't you?
The fight between Metsu and Adel's team.

rows.label: bf11590150_0340
rows.name: Y-yes.

rows.label: bf11590150_0350
rows.name: What did you think?

rows.label: bf11590150_0360
rows.name: What did I think?

rows.label: bf11590150_0370
rows.name:
It was a battle beyond human comprehension...
I can't describe it.

rows.label: bf11590150_0380
rows.name: That's right, Zettar.

rows.label: bf11590150_0390
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]?

rows.label: bf11590150_0400
rows.name: That wasn't a battle as we know it.

rows.label: bf11590150_0410
rows.name: Watching that fight, I was convinced...

rows.label: bf11590150_0420
rows.name: that no matter what we do, we're no match for Metsu.

rows.label: bf11590150_0430
rows.name: Wha[ML:Dash]

rows.label: bf11590150_0440
rows.name: How could our army do what even Adel's team couldn't?

rows.label: bf11590150_0450
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: bf11590150_0460
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11590150_0470
rows.name:
Your Majesty Emperor Hugo,
my foolish brother has been rude.

rows.label: bf11590150_0480
rows.name: Our nation's very existence hangs by a thread.

rows.label: bf11590150_0490
rows.name: The resistance is our last ray of hope.

rows.label: bf11590150_0500
rows.name:
Will you lend us your aid again,
to defeat the Heaven's Holy Grail?

rows.label: bf11590150_0510
rows.name: That's why I came here in the first place.

rows.label: bf11590150_0520
rows.name: Isn't that right, Prince Adel?

rows.label: bf11590150_0530
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf11590150_0540
rows.name: Your Majesty

rows.label: bf11590150_0542
rows.name:
I, Adel Ordo, will protect the future of my homeland,
even if it costs me my life.

rows.label: bf11590150_0550
rows.name: By the way...

rows.label: bf11590150_0560
rows.name: I believe your name was Laura-dono?

rows.label: bf11590150_0570
rows.name: Huh? Me? Y-yes!

rows.label: bf11590150_0580
rows.name: Your efforts were also magnificent.

rows.label: bf11590150_0600
rows.name: I hear you're not a knight or a soldier.

rows.label: bf11590150_0610
rows.name: Yes, I'm from a village on the distant frontier.

rows.label: bf11590150_0620
rows.name: I'm part of a mercenary group now.

rows.label: bf11590150_0630
rows.name: Just as I thought...

rows.label: bf11590150_0640
rows.name: Laura-dono, I wish to reward your efforts as a citizen.

rows.label: bf11590150_0650
rows.name: Will you accept the title of knight of our realm?

rows.label: bf11590150_0660
rows.name: Me? A knight?

rows.label: bf11590150_0670
rows.name: Oh, that's a wonderful idea.

rows.label: bf11590150_0680
rows.name: No way... someone like me...

rows.label: bf11590150_0690
rows.name: Don't worry about it. Titles are just for show.

rows.label: bf11590150_0700
rows.name: Just look at me.

rows.label: bf11590150_0710
rows.name: Plus, it should ease one of your worries.

rows.label: bf11590150_0720
rows.name:
Laura-dono, allow me to use you
for my own selfish purpose.

rows.label: bf11590150_0730
rows.name:
The people are now shrouded in the great
shadow of Metsu, in deep despair.

rows.label: bf11590150_0740
rows.name: I want you to be a flower blooming in that despair.

rows.label: bf11590150_0750
rows.name: What should I do...

rows.label: bf11590150_0760
rows.name: I understand.

rows.label: bf11590150_0770
rows.name: I will accept.

rows.label: bf11590150_0780
rows.name: Well said.

rows.label: bf11590150_0790
rows.name:
Laura-dono's award ceremony will be held
at a later date in the plaza before the Royal Palace.
